name: Hatha yoga
description: Hatha is a general category that includes most yoga styles. It is an old system that includes the practice of  pranayama , which help bring peace to the mind and body, preparing the body for deeper spiritual practices such as meditation.

name: Kundalini yoga
description: Kundalini incorporates repeated movements or exercises, dynamic breathing techniques, chanting, meditation and mantras. Each specific kundalini exercise, referred to as a kriya, is a movement that is often repeated and is synchronized with the breath.

name: Vinyasa Yoga
description: Like hatha, vinyasa yoga is a general term that describes many different styles of yoga. It essentially means movement synchronized with breath and is a vigorous style based on a rapid flow through sun salutations.

name: Power Yoga
description: Kundalini yoga practice is equal parts spiritual and physical. This style is all about releasing the kundalini energy or coiled, in the lower spine.

name: Jivamukti Yoga
description: Kundalini yoga practice is equal parts spiritual and physical. This style is all about releasing the kundalini energy or coiled, in the lower spine.

name: Ashtanga yoga
description: In Sanskrit, ashtanga is translated as 'Eight Limb path.' In Mysore, India, people gather to practice this form of yoga together at their own pace.
